gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop
Class HL7SDKDropTargetAdapter

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.dragdrop.HL7SDKDropTargetAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.util.EventListener
public class HL7SDKDropTargetAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener

This Adapter class implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener interface to provide support for Drop action.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:03 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

public void drop(java.awt.dnd.DropTargetDropEvent e)
perform action from getSourceActions on the transferrable invoke acceptDrop or rejectDrop invoke dropComplete if its a local (same JVM) transfer, use StringTransferable.localStringFlavor find a match for the flavor check the operation get the transferable according to the chosen flavor do the transfer
